jobDescription: Collinwood's client, a major healthcare insurance company, is seeking someone who will be responsible for designing enhancements and new business applications and/or information systems solutions through integration of technical and business requirements. You will serve as technical designer to identify best solution and resulting technical specifications within limits of code environment; linking Business Analyst needs and Architect definition to technical solutions. Required Skills:5-7 years of IT experienceHealthcare experience; preferably payer, membership systems, and claims.5 years of data mapping experienceExperience in creating mapping rules from source to target with transformations.Support Data integrity in various environments.Knowledge of application configuration.Knowledge of Integration Technologies such as DataStage.Knowledge of Data Modeling, Data Warehousing and ETL concepts.Strong SQL skills.Knowledge of at least one RDBMS such as Hadoop, DB2 / Teradata.Exposure to Big Data patterns and data formats.Strong data profiling and analysis skills.Requirements definition & management.SDLC Methodology - Agile / Scrum / Iterative Development.Experience with code optimization and performance tuning.Strong experience with JIRA or some other related Agile management tooling like Rally, Microsoft TFS.Should be able to take user stories and work with teams to organize them into tasks, sprints, releases as well as some experience in backlog grooming, change management tasks, etc.Familiarity with Java.Bachelor’s Degree
